mapper.select:
SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 NO, TST_BOARD_NO, TST_BOARD_CATEGORY, TST_BOARD_TITLE, TST_BOARD_CONTENTS, TST_USER_ID, TST_BOARD_DELFLAG, DATE_FORMAT(TST_INSERT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS TST_INSERT_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(TST_MODIFY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS TST_MODIFY_DATE
FROM TST_BOARD, (SELECT @rownum:=0) r
WHERE TST_BOARD_DELFLAG ='N' AND TST_BOARD_CATEGORY=#{tst_board_category}
ORDER BY NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TST_BOARD( TST_BOARD_CATEGORY, TST_BOARD_TITLE, TST_BOARD_CONTENTS, TST_USER_ID, TST_INSERT_DATE, TST_MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{tst_board_category}, #{tst_board_title}, #{tst_board_contents}, #{tst_user_id}, NOW(), NOW())
